channel.title: LIBRCHAIN 区块链新闻雷达
channel.description: 每小时自动更新的区块链新闻、博客与 X 热点聚合

item.title: Coinbase CEO Pushes Back on UK Stablecoin Caps as Token Profits Surge
item.description: The proposal would cap stablecoin holdings and curb yields, a move critics say could push liquidity overseas as stablecoins become a core revenue stream.

item.title: South Korean man faces jail over alleged poisoning over crypto trading losses
item.description: South Korean prosecutors reportedly accused a man of poisoning a business partner with pesticide in a dispute over losses due to crypto trading.

item.title: Bitcoin bounces above $65,000 as dollar weakens and bullish hopes build
item.description: A broad uptick across tokens arrived alongside a softer greenback and a rally in Asian equities, though analysts remain split on whether the Feb. 5 lows will hold.

item.title: Bitcoin Ticks Higher as Markets Weigh Trump Address, Broader Risk Sentiment
item.description: Bitcoin remains sensitive to broader risk sentiment, with traders positioning ahead of Nvidia’s earnings and a rebound in global stocks.

item.title: Bitcoin captures $65K after US stocks rebound from AI sell-off: Will it hold?
item.description: Bitcoin rallied above $66,000 following a positive close from US stock markets, putting Monday’s AI and tech-stock driven sell-off to rest. Will $60,000 remain the BTC bottom?

item.title: Payoneer joins rush of fintechs bidding for US bank charters
item.description: Coinbase, World Liberty Financial and Laser Digital are also in line for a banking charter in the US, after Crypto.com received conditional approval for a charter on Monday.

item.title: Bitcoin Depot to require ID for all transactions at its crypto ATMs
item.description: Bitcoin Depot is moving to require ID for all transactions as regulators have cracked down on crypto ATM operators over scams and money laundering concerns.

item.title: Stripe considers acquiring some or all of PayPal: Report
item.description: Bloomberg reports that Stripe is in early acquisition talks with PayPal as the payments giant has battled competition, leadership turmoil and an 85% stock drop from its peak.

item.title: Stripe in Early Talks on Potential PayPal Deal: Bloomberg
item.description: The deal could combine two major payments firms already expanding into stablecoin and crypto infrastructure.

item.title: Crypto lobby Blockchain Association pitches tax plan to Congress
item.description: The Blockchain Association released its tax policy positions, saying “low-dollar” crypto transfers should be exempted, but mining and staking should be taxed.

item.title: Anthropic says it's been targeted in massive distillation attacks
item.description: Anthropic alleges Chinese AI companies DeepSeek, Moonshot and MiniMax made 24,000 accounts and 16 million Claude exchanges to scrape its AI bot for training.

item.title: Bitwise acquires Chorus One, potentially paving way for more staked ETFs
item.description: Bitwise’s acquisition of Chorus One expands the company’s staking capabilities to more than 30 blockchains, including Solana, Hyperliquid, Monad, Avalanche and Sui.

item.title: Treasury Sanctions Russian ‘Exploit’ Broker Over Stolen US Cyber Tools
item.description: It marks the first use of the Protecting American Intellectual Property Act, targeting a firm accused of brokering stolen U.S. cyber tools.

item.title: Coinbase, Kraken and Binance Push Deeper Into Tokenization as Capital Shifts
item.description: Tokenized real-world assets have continued to expand despite a broader market slide, with assets distributed on-chain up nearly 300% year over year.

item.title: ETH options turn bearish as traders prepare for extended Ether price downside
item.description: Ether faces a bearish trend as onchain fees and network deposits hit multiyear lows. Until derivatives metrics stabilize, ETH price remains at risk.

item.title: Bitcoin Depot Will Require ID for 'Every Transaction' at ATMs Amid Growing Pressure
item.description: Bitcoin Depot will begin verifying customers’ identities each time they use its ATMs, voluntarily refining its compliance procedures.

item.title: ESMA warns crypto perpetual derivatives likely fall under CFD rules
item.description: The EU authority tracking compliance under the MiCA framework issued a warning to those marketing crypto derivatives as “perpetual futures or perpetual contracts.”

item.title: Crypto wallets for AI agents are creating a new legal frontier, says Electric Capital
item.description: As AI agents grow more autonomous, developers are already giving them crypto wallets, allowing software to hold assets, pay for services, trade tokens and even hire other agents. The technical pieces are falling into place. The legal ones …

item.title: Payments giant Stripe reportedly mulling PayPal acquisition. Here is what it means for crypto
item.description: Bloomberg reported that Stripe — which has growing stablecoin and blockchain ambitions — is exploring a deal for the embattled fintech.

item.title: Coinbase opens stock and ETF trading to all US users in multi-asset push
item.description: The exchange now allows US customers to trade thousands of stocks and ETFs commission-free alongside crypto, with 24/5 access and instant funding.

item.title: Kraken debuts tokenized stock perpetual futures for non-US traders
item.description: Kraken’s new contracts, built on the xStocks framework, offer up to 20x leverage on tokenized benchmarks tied to US equities and gold.

item.title: MoonPay launches ‘Agents,’ giving AI systems wallets and onchain cash flow
item.description: MoonPay debuts infrastructure enabling AI agents to transact with stablecoins onchain as both crypto and non-crypto companies race to build the “agent economy.”

item.title: OpenAI Says Benchmark Used to Measure AI Coding Skill Is 'Contaminated'—Here's Why
item.description: OpenAI wants to retire the leading AI coding benchmark—and the reasons reveal a deeper problem with how the whole industry measures itself.

item.title: Bitwise's Hunter Horsley says AI Is ‘unstoppable freight train’ for crypto, while Haun’s Monica urges caution
item.description: As artificial intelligence races ahead, some crypto executives believe it could become the force that finally pushes blockchain infrastructure into widespread use. Others aren’t convinced the leap is so straightforward.

item.title: 'Stablecoin Summer': Stripe Makes Tender Offer at $159 Billion Valuation
item.description: Payments giant Stripe made a tender offer valuing the firm at $159 billion as payments and stablecoin volumes rise.

item.title: After Donating $35 Million to Trump PAC, Crypto.com Scores Wins From Regulators
item.description: Weeks after giving another $5 million to a pro-Trump PAC, the exchange received lawsuit aid from the CFTC and a bank charter from the Treasury Department.

item.title: South Korean Man Faces Murder Charge Over Bitcoin Bet Gone Bad
item.description: Prosecutors in Seoul say a man poisoned his business partner after the colleague mismanaged his Bitcoin investments.

item.title: Crypto isn't losing to AI, its just 'capitalism doing its job,' says Dragonfly
item.description: Comparisons between AI’s explosive consumer adoption and crypto’s trajectory misunderstand the nature of the products, Dragonfly's Haseeb Qureshi told CoinDesk in an interview.

item.title: Crypto’s biggest exchange fights back against allegations of moving billions of Iran-linked money
item.description: The Wall Street Journal, The New York Times and Fortune all reported that investigators had been let go after identifying sanctions-violating transactions.

item.title: Key Bitcoin onchain signal may mark BTC’s next demand revival
item.description: Bitcoin remains pinned below $65,000 as random bouts of intense selling pressure persist, but one onchain indicator has stabilized, providing insight into when spot market demand may return.

item.title: Polymarket users favor Meteora in bets over ZachXBT crypto takedown
item.description: Users placed more than $7 million betting on the outcome of the crypto sleuth's investigation, expected to be announced on Thursday.

item.title: Millions in crypto funded tools to exploit U.S. software, Treasury says in new sanctions
item.description: An Australian national was said to sell cyber tools designed for the U.S. government and its allies to a Russian company known as Operation Zero.

item.title: I agree with this. Though with the proviso that because Ethereum is permissionless, various centralized and closed things will inevitably exist on top of it. Our job should be to make the open-source, permissionless, trustless, secure censorship resistant ecosyst - x.com
item.description: <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiZkFVX3lxTE11aEg2dGZNYUVDeDg3ZVpZWkhERVh3aHQ1RTYtamNYUXYxRmRMR1hmUmF4NFktNDRad3gwRVpWODZPYTQwdU15d05PZlBRb3g4RGFlREFYQVdxSlBuZjZIZVk2VUVvZw?oc=5" target="_blank">I agree with this. Though wi…

item.title: Solo Bitcoin Miner Nabs $200K After Renting $75 Worth of Hash Power
item.description: Despite incredibly long odds, someone scored a $200K BTC block reward after spending just $75 to rent Bitcoin mining power.

item.title: Longest Ether dip since 2022 ignored by whales: What’s next for ETH?
item.description: Ether whale order sizes are shrinking, while a $2 billion short cluster near $2,000 frame a tightening liquidity scenario for ETH after a sixth week of red price action.

item.title: Empery Digital shareholder demands sale of 4,000-plus Bitcoin treasury, resignations
item.description: A 9.8% shareholder has doubled down on calls for Empery Digital to sell its BTC holdings, return capital to investors and remove its CEO and board.

item.title: Fed proposes rule to deal with crypto debanking by scrapping 'reputation risk'
item.description: The proposal would cut the risk factor from Fed oversight and bar supervisors from pushing banks to cut off disfavored businesses, including in crypto.

item.title: Prediction market firms could be making $10 billion in yearly revenue by 2030, Citizens Bank says
item.description: The bank said rising volumes, tighter market structure and early institutional engagement are pushing prediction markets beyond their gambling roots toward a new asset class.

item.title: WisdomTree Gets SEC Nod to Enable Instant Settlement for Tokenized Money Market Fund
item.description: WisdomTree is enabling instant settlement for its tokenized money market fund, indicating its product won't be limited by Wall Street’s pace.

item.title: Bitcoin retakes $64,000, crypto miners rally, as AI-related software rout eases
item.description: Sellers are taking a breather as bitcoin's Fear & Greed Index plunged to levels never seen before.

item.title: WisdomTree gets SEC approval for round-the-clock trading of tokenized MMF
item.description: The approval allows WisdomTree’s tokenized Treasury money market fund to trade and settle around the clock within the US regulatory framework.

item.title: Binance CEO hints at legal action over report on Iranian sanctions
item.description: Two major news outlets published similar reports on Monday claiming that Binance had fired or suspended employees involved in an investigation into crypto going to Iranian entities.

item.title: Defi is a central part of the value that Ethereum provides. Financial empowerment is a central part of what it means to have agency and freedom in our current world. Finance is far from the only thing that Ethereum is good for, but it is an important thing. This po - x.com
item.description: <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiZkFVX3lxTE9yMHRKc0hWd0ZCWGx1X3lnV1FQVGRiY1VCdmZ3SzMwTV9iOTByUTlySlBIb21USlRXcG9OQ0lnQ2xPdU05eUM2ejJSeUUyN1dkdVNPVFR4TnYweVhvaWVBcUZaNXNWQQ?oc=5" target="_blank">Defi is a central part of th…

item.title: Stripe's Bridge sees stablecoin volume quadruple as utility insulates from 'crypto winter'
item.description: The payments giant says Bridge, its stablecoin arm, saw its transaction volume sky-rocket through last year as stablecoin adoption is decoupling from crypto cycles.

item.title: What NYSE’s exploration of onchain systems means for financial markets
item.description: Tokenized securities, 24/7 trading and onchain settlement could allow the NYSE’s blockchain plans to reshape post-trade processes in financial markets.

item.title: Trump’s White House Has One View of Crypto Legislation. His Family’s Crypto Company Has Another
item.description: World Liberty Financial is backing Coinbase on the crypto market structure bill debate, even as the White House criticizes the company.

item.title: Ethereum Foundation Starts Staking Treasury Amid Vitalik Buterin's ETH Sales
item.description: The Ethereum Foundation began staking ETH as part of new treasury operations amid a string of sales from co-founder Vitalik Buterin.

item.title: Bitcoin Traders Expect More Pain Ahead After BTC Falls 50% From Peak
item.description: Bitcoin dropped below the $63,000 mark overnight, falling more than 50% from its October peak as traders project a further dip ahead.

item.title: An Unsolved Mystery in Crypto: How Much Money Does @machibigbrother Really Have? Every time he gets liquidated and his account is almost wiped out, he deposits more money into Hyperliquid and keeps going long. He just deposited another 245K $US - x.com
item.description: <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiYkFVX3lxTE5ORlNJTVJweHZZdlVWTnc4RmdsTWlHNGl0Zy04ZlhIa2FuN2lROFhoX2FLQTJudlpsNnUtd2MwbU9NM1dEZGF6d0pSeERpbW54M2VpY1o2Sm5FaHVmczVmU2lB?oc=5" target="_blank">An Unsolved Mystery in Crypto: How…

item.title: Kraken rolls out crypto-style, 24/7 perpetuals trading for tokenized U.S. stocks
item.description: The crypto exchange is bringing U.S. stocks closer to the crypto world, letting users trade derivatives of tokenized stocks around-the-clock and with 20x leverage.

item.title: Adam Back's BSTR moving forward with public listing plans, hopes for April approval
item.description: Back remains optimistic despite the brutal price action in bitcoin and BTC treasury companies.

item.title: Wall Street’s big blockchain win: SEC gives WisdomTree the green light for instant, around-the-clock trading
item.description: The move adds momentum to the $10 billion large tokenized Treasury market led by BlackRock, Circle and others.

item.title: Bitcoin’s U.S. demand signal turns negative for a record 40 days
item.description: The indicator last printed positive on Jan. 15. Its failure to fully recover after a Feb. 5 rebound suggests U.S. demand remains structurally absent rather than temporarily paused.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg's Meta is planning stablecoin comeback in the second half of this year
item.description: The Facebook owner’s stablecoin integration involves a third party vendor to help administer stablecoin-based payments and a new wallet to be implemented, sources said.

item.title: Binance brings back tokenized stocks trading with Ondo Finance deal
item.description: The world’s largest crypto exchange has listed a batch of tokenized U.S. equities issued by Ondo Finance on its Binance Alpha platform, reviving stock trading push.

item.title: CoinDesk 20 performance update: index falls 2% as nearly all constituents decline
item.description: Internet Computer (ICP), up 1.2%, was the only gainer from Monday.

item.title: Solana DeFi Project Step Finance to Wind Down Weeks After $29M Hack
item.description: The Solana projects made the "difficult decision" to cease operations after January's treasury breach and subsequent failed rescue efforts.

item.title: Coinbase adds stock, ETF trading as it expands beyond crypto
item.description: The move pits Coinbase against Robinhood as it pushes to become an “everything exchange.”

item.title: Your AI is getting a bank account: MoonPay just gave bots the power to spend money
item.description: MoonPay Agents is a non-custodial, permissionless financial infrastructure for AI agents that move money.

item.title: Morning Minute: Ethereum's Next Upgrade Features Censorship Resistance
item.description: Ethereum is going back to its cypherpunk ethos with FOCIL—but it could create compliance issues down the line.
